description:
This beautiful, stylish property truly feels like you've arrived home! Boasting 4 bedrooms, a separate family room, and an open plan living and dining area that leads out to the alfresco. This overlooks the beautiful inground pool and landscaped tropical gardens.

The contemporary kitchen comes complete with a brand-new dishwasher, modern stainless-steel appliances, gas cooktop, breakfast bar and an abundance of cupboard and bench space.

Gorgeous master suite featuring air-conditioning, walk-in robe, lavish ensuite with double shower heads and twin basins, ceiling fan, and direct access to the landscaped backyard. Additional 3 bedrooms have built-in robes, ceiling fans and air-conditioning to bedrooms 2 and 3 - perfect for all year-round comfort.

Boasting high ceilings and an abundance of natural lighting throughout, this home offers a sense of warmth and spaciousness throughout. Located in a beautiful, family friendly area close to parks, bike tracks, lakes, public and private schools, Westfield shopping centre, Ikea, and numerous transport options.

This is a home sure to deliver for families looking for a well-proportioned, impeccably maintained, and modern lowset home.

Further details you'll love:

- Modern kitchen complete with dishwasher, gas cooktop, breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage
- Open plan living and dining area with air-conditioning
- Additional large family room featuring new carpet and air-conditioning
- Master bedroom with walk-in robe, ensuite, air-conditioning and ceiling fan
- Further 3 bedrooms complete with built in robes and ceiling fans.
- Bedrooms 2 and 3 have air-conditioning
- Gorgeous outdoor entertaining area featuring a built in BBQ and outdoor speakers
- Sparkling in ground pool with water feature
- Beautiful, landscaped gardens
- Brand new carpets throughout
- High ceilings
- Side access suitable for a boat or jet ski
- Security screens throughout
- Ceiling fans to all bedrooms
- Situated on a 486m2 allotment
- Built in 2007
- Rental Appraisal: $750-$800 per week, unfurnished

To find out more, please don't hesitate to contact Ryan Suhle on 0427 706 699.

Local Schools:
Bounty Blvd State School Catchment - Prep to year 6
North Lakes State College - Prep to year 12
The Lakes College Private
St Benedict's Catholic Primary School
St Benedict's Catholic College

Short Drive to:
Mango Hill & Dakabin Train Stations
Bunnings & Costco
Ikea & Westfield Shopping Centre
North Lakes Sports Club

Distances:
Brisbane CBD approx 45 min drive
Brisbane Airport approx 25 mins
Sunshine Coast approx 55 min drive
